Package http.webserver

Class RequestResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • http.webserver.RequestResolver
  • public class RequestResolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the work of answering the request

      Adds a POST route on @param path for customized behaviour
      static void resolveDelete​(Request r, java.net.Socket s, java.lang.String publicPath)
      Resolves a DELETE request by looking for the specified file in the public folder and deleting it if it exists.

    • Method Detail

      • ajouterRoute

        public void ajouterRoute​(java.lang.String path,
                         Route route)
        Adds a POST route on @param path for customized behaviour
        Parameters:
        path - : a route starting with /
        route - : an object implementing the Route interface

      • resolveRequest

        public void resolveRequest​(Request r,
                           java.net.Socket s,
                           java.lang.String publicPath)
        Main method for answering a request. It does the job of routing the request to the correct resolver.a
        Parameters:
        r - : the parsed request
        s - : The socket to which we should send the response
        publicPath - : the path of the public files folder

      • resolvePost

        public void resolvePost​(Request r,
                        java.net.Socket s,
                        java.lang.String publicPath)
        Resolves a POST request by looking if it's registered. If not a 404 is sent.
        Parameters:
        r - : the parsed request
        s - : The socket to which we should send the response
        publicPath - : the path of the public files folder

      • resolveDelete

        public static void resolveDelete​(Request r,
                                 java.net.Socket s,
                                 java.lang.String publicPath)
        Resolves a DELETE request by looking for the specified file in the public folder and deleting it if it exists.
        Parameters:
        r - : the parsed request
        s - : The socket to which we should send the response
        publicPath - : the path of the public files folder

      • resolvePut

        public static void resolvePut​(Request r,
                              java.net.Socket s,
                              java.lang.String publicPath)
        Resolves a PUT request by looking for the specified file in the public folder overwriting it if it exists or creating folders if needed.
        Parameters:
        r - : the parsed request
        s - : The socket to which we should send the response
        publicPath - : the path of the public files folder

      • resolveGet

        public static void resolveGet​(Request request,
                              java.net.Socket socket,
                              java.lang.String publicPath,
                              boolean isHead)
        Resolves a GET request by looking for the specified file in the public folder. If the file is found it is sent. If the file is not found it tries to find the index.html in the specified folder.
        Parameters:
        r - : the parsed request
        s - : The socket to which we should send the response
        publicPath - : the path of the public files folder
